title: Fix runtime error by globally wiring existing SoundProvider

requirements.summary: Ensure the entire React app is wrapped by the existing SoundProvider so any useSound call (including via SoundEffectsManager on the feed/homepage) is always within provider scope.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the homepage/feed no longer throws: "useSound must be used within SoundProvider"
SoundEffectsManager can call useSound without runtime errors on any route
The SoundProvider used is the existing provider from frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx (no duplicate/alternate sound context is introduced)

file_operations.description: Import SoundProvider from frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx and wrap the appâ€™s existing top-level providers/content (router and related UI like Toaster) with this existing SoundProvider to make sound context available globally without changing SoundContext logic or touching frontend/src/main.tsx.
